item.title: Show and Tell: A Neural Image Caption Generator
item.description: This is the deep learning course final project trying to reporduce the results reported in the paper, Show and Tell: A Neural Image Caption Generator. The model is trained on the MS coco2014 dataset. Our final result looks like For code, UI, and report please click here.
